parameters: There is a diary with a combination lock on the table.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]There might be clues to the combination.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The style of the cover page doesn't look like a child's diary.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Mhm...perhaps this is \c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan's diary\c[0]. Let's see what's written inside.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]So...\.\.Zhao Xiaojuan was \c[1]possessed by Tian Yu's spirit\c[0]?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]No wonder Wang Jincai said Zhao Xiaojuan was mad after the Tian family murder case.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I would think the same thing if I see it...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]But I still think something doesn't make sense...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Don't you see something strange about this?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Every time Zhao Xiaojuan behaved weirdly,
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]as if she was \c[1]secretly monitoring her\c[0].
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It could be a coincidence, being in the same place while living under the same roof is pretty normal.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]This is Zhao Xiaojuan's bedroom, if this was her,
she'd just walk in, she wouldn't have knocked.
There is a burning candle at the door.
Leap over the candle and leave the room
Leap over the candle and leave the room
There is a crack on the wall.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It seems the patterns on the two pieces of paper can be \c[1]combined\c[0], I'll put them together and take a look.
A human-shaped hole was torn open on the wall.
There is a crack on the wall.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It seems the patterns on the two pieces of paper can be \c[1]combined \c[0], I'll put them together and take a look.
A human-shaped hole was torn open on the wall.
